subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: All those curious to know just how fast Usain Bolt might have gone if he had not stopped sprinting near the end of last year's world-record run at the Olympics now have a much clearer answer.
snippet: All those curious to know just how fast Usain Bolt might have gone if he had not stopped sprinting near the end of last year's world-record run at the Olympics now have a much clearer answer.
